ml.model

Class DrawnNodeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.model.DrawnNodeInfo

  • public class DrawnNodeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    DrawNodeInfo class

    A pojo that encapsulates information useful for drawing a node of a decision tree.

    Author:
    Gabriel, Vishnu
